paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant c.186G>C, including penetrance data and individual case details.

patients.demographics: 74 year-old male of Argentinean native origin

individual_records.phenotype_details: Progressive decreased sensitivity and associated loss of strength in four limbs, needing assistance for walking.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: A 74 year-old male was evaluated for progressive decreased sensitivity and associated loss of strength in four limbs in the previous two years.

functional_data.summary: The variant is located in the critical functional domain and has not been published before.

variants.evidence_level: Based on clinical phenotype and ACMG variant classification standards.
variants.additional_notes: The variant has been reported only in ClinVar and not in other large population databases.
key_quotes: The resulting variant (Glu62Asp), located in the critical functional domain, has not been published before.
We concluded that this novel variant should be considered likely pathogenic according to the available information.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data regarding the TTR variant was extracted from the main text.
